content: the white stag mitts about one of the most beloved cable stitches the staghorn cable stitch is known for its stacked v-shaped cables that give the look of deer antlers deceptively easy to knit you ll use just two basic cable stitches it s a perfect introduction to knitting cables the rest of the body of the white stag mitt is classic stockinette and the two cuffs are ribbed with k1p1 repeats thumb gusset instructions are specific to left and right mitts knitting pattern the white stag mitts difficulty based on skill levels for knitting standards and guidelines www yarnstandards pattern designers and makers the white stag mitts crochet pattern yarn and supplies note on construction of the mitts the white stag mitts are knit in the round choose between two sizes adult female small and adult female medium/large with smaller needles begin knitting at the wrist cuff in k1p1 rib then switch to larger needles and knit the body of the glove using the cable chart and written instructions when you come to the thumb gusset note there are different sets of instructions for the left mitt and the right mitt to finish you ll knit the finger cuff as you did the wrist cuff in
